d1f4e7b2-295b-4996-9335-7ae5722f7c7b.notes: Drains 1 HP + 1/level per second. For every 3 HP stolen, you heal 1 HP or 1 FP (your choice). Also lets you bite in combat without feeding. Add Teeth (Sharp Teeth) or Teeth (Sharp Beak) – your choice for free.

8aba8630-ab56-4363-bf92-e9fa6d04d235.name: Diffuse
8aba8630-ab56-4363-bf92-e9fa6d04d235.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

71a7f6d7-ff0c-488e-93f8-0accf0c15de4.name: Homogenous
71a7f6d7-ff0c-488e-93f8-0accf0c15de4.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

70e09e36-c078-453b-ac94-a5af623acf0c.name: No Blood
70e09e36-c078-453b-ac94-a5af623acf0c.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

7ebc128e-358b-454d-9dec-83d6be2317fc.name: No Brain
7ebc128e-358b-454d-9dec-83d6be2317fc.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

c60c0095-63e1-4177-9e35-6ad6adbd3a43.name: No Eyes
c60c0095-63e1-4177-9e35-6ad6adbd3a43.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

bcfd1ee0-c35a-4d1b-9873-6526f7d9c54c.name: No Head
bcfd1ee0-c35a-4d1b-9873-6526f7d9c54c.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

573ee1e4-d440-4d23-bfb8-e1daa05f2b48.name: No Neck

1ff7c5d2-af46-4260-a368-df2d3eef4d84.name: No Vitals
1ff7c5d2-af46-4260-a368-df2d3eef4d84.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

8e126fd5-8f58-4105-8ab7-f5bbdf5ba373.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

2eb77b06-91d8-4719-a9e1-dbfc4c6ac353.name: No Blood
2eb77b06-91d8-4719-a9e1-dbfc4c6ac353.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

9d306fd3-bba1-4cef-b220-50a4bac64549.name: No Brain
9d306fd3-bba1-4cef-b220-50a4bac64549.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

a3ad8096-03a1-45c2-9001-2ff827eab4be.name: No Eyes
a3ad8096-03a1-45c2-9001-2ff827eab4be.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

8a1996e2-d238-409e-be8c-eef9afe5dad4.name: No Head
8a1996e2-d238-409e-be8c-eef9afe5dad4.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

0864c8c9-0d8e-4496-b7ab-007ee0485d7e.name: No Neck
0864c8c9-0d8e-4496-b7ab-007ee0485d7e.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

fcb46c9d-a9e0-480c-bd40-f93795a49ea3.name: No Vitals
fcb46c9d-a9e0-480c-bd40-f93795a49ea3.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

017d43e2-8f2a-4b80-a04b-f5103a0d98b7.name: Unliving
017d43e2-8f2a-4b80-a04b-f5103a0d98b7.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

3355bdb8-607d-45e1-b945-62b3b47e3c6d.name: Know Your Own Strength Variant Price

f8ae405d-6121-4b96-b563-e7e4a8039d5b.name: Know Your Own Strength Variant Price

c3bacf58-7315-4d21-b016-7cb0a2d6f649.name: Know Your Own Strength Variant Price

a74d524d-877c-47ee-bc79-9f489052aecc.name: Know Your Own Strength Variant Price

eb1a4fbf-ef5f-43a2-92e2-6e9090cb2052.name: Single-Minded
eb1a4fbf-ef5f-43a2-92e2-6e9090cb2052.notes: +3 to rolls for any lengthy mental task you concentrate on to the exclusion of other activities, if the GM feels such focus would be beneficial. You tend to ignore everything else while obsessed and have -5 to all rolls to notice interruptions.

04a78849-b906-48cd-bd0b-bf8c3c124881.name: Know Your Own Strength Pricing Variant

c1f5134b-4468-4823-877b-a95ad0368ca2.name: Know Your Own Strength Pricing Variant

89c811e5-3b58-4009-a3c7-112bc64b4d70.name: Know Your Own Strength Pricing Variant

5667edc5-b6e5-43bb-85d6-81827e75d12f.name: Know Your Own Strength Pricing Variant
